PangyPlot

PangyPlot is a visualization tool developed for human pangenomic research. Its primary function is to offer visual representations of large graph genomes, facilitating the exploration and analysis of complex genomic data.

Motivation

A visual interface is fundamental for detecting patterns and gaining meaningful insights into large, complex genomic datasets. Pangenomes typically rely on a graph-based data structure, which are very difficult to navigate without a visualization of the graph topology.

https://github.com/ScottMastro/graph_viz
